009package imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data;
010
011import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
012import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
014
015import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
016
017
018/**
019 * Supplies all numeric data for Zhang's demo calibration test suite.
020 *
021 * @author WB
022 */
023public abstract class ZhangData {
024        
025        public static final int ImageWidth = 640;
026        public static final int ImageHeight = 480;
027        public static final int NumberOfViews = ObservedPoints.pointData.length;
028        
029        public static Point2D[] getModelPoints() {
030                return StandardModel.getPoints();
031        }
032        
033        public static Point2D[] getObservedPoints(int viewNr) {
034                return ObservedPoints.getPoints(viewNr);
035        }
036        
037        public static Point2D[][] getAllObservedPoints() {
038                Point2D obsPoints[][] = new Point2D[NumberOfViews][];
039                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
040                        int viewNr = i + 1;
041                        obsPoints[i] = getObservedPoints(viewNr);
042                }
043                return obsPoints;
044        }
045        
046        public static ViewTransform[] getAllViewTransforms() {
047                ViewTransform[] viewtransforms = new ViewTransform[NumberOfViews];
048                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
049                        viewtransforms[i] = getViewTransform(i);
050                }
051//              return new ViewTransform[] 
052//                      {getViewTransform(1), getViewTransform(2), getViewTransform(3), getViewTransform(4), getViewTransform(5)};
053                return viewtransforms;
054        }
055        
056        public static ViewTransform getViewTransform(int viewNr) {
057                double[][] RT = CameraViews.getViewMatrix(viewNr);
058                return (RT == null) ? null : new ViewTransform(MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(RT));
059        }
060        
061        public static Camera getCameraIntrinsics() {
062                // http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/zhang/calib/Calibration/Calib.txt
063                return new Camera (
064                                832.5,   832.53, 0.204494,      // alpha, beta, gamma, (!)
065                                303.959, 206.585,                       // c_x, c_y
066                                -0.228601, 0.190353);           // k1, k2
067        }
068                
069        public static int extractViewNumber(String imgShortTitle) {
070//              String imgShortTitle = im.getShortTitle();
071                String num = imgShortTitle.substring(imgShortTitle.length() - 1, imgShortTitle.length());
072                return Integer.decode(num) - 1;
073        }
074
075}
